title: UnitedHealthcare
shortDescription: Largest U.S. health insurer with extensive autism service coverage options.
description: UnitedHealthcare is the largest health insurance company in the United States, offering plans through employers, individual markets, Medicare Advantage, and Medicaid managed care programs. UnitedHealthcare plans generally include autism benefits covering ABA therapy, speech therapy, occupational therapy, and behavioral health services. The company has dedicated autism support resources and care coordination programs for families navigating services.
benefits: ABA therapy coverage in most plans
requirements: Prior authorization required for most ABA services
Treatment plans may require periodic review

links.description: Official UnitedHealthcare website - find providers and check benefits
